Package presenter

Class MainWindowPresenter

java.lang.Object
presenter.MainWindowPresenter
public class MainWindowPresenter extends Object
The mediator between the view and the model. Make all the decisions for view.

    Instantiates a new Main window presenter.

    • MainWindowPresenter

      Instantiates a new Main window presenter.

  • Method Details

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(boolean currencyOnline, boolean pastebinOnline)
      Sets status. If currencyOnline is true, then use online implementation for CurrencyScoop, else use offline implementation. If pastebinOnline is true, then use online implementation for Pastebin, else use offline implementation.
      Parameters:
      currencyOnline - the currency online
      pastebinOnline - the pastebin online

    • showMapWindow

      public void showMapWindow()
      Show map window. This method will also show all the selected countries' currency code after closing.

    • showCurrency

      public void showCurrency()
      Show all the selected countries' currency code in main window.

    • getResult

      public void getResult(String fromCurrency, String toCurrency, String amount)
      Gets result of the conversion between the two given currency codes. If there is a cache hit, the result will depend on the user's choice. If user choose to use cache, then the result is pulled from database. If user choose to request fresh data, then this method will proceed to request fresh data from API. If there is no cache hit, then this method will proceed to request fresh data from API. This method involves concurrency.
      Parameters:
      fromCurrency - the from currency
      toCurrency - the to currency
      amount - the amount

    • getAPIRequestTask

      public Task<Result> getAPIRequestTask(double finalAmount, String finalFromCurrency, String finalToCurrency, MainWindowView mainWindowView, boolean useCache)
      Create the unique task to not occupy the GUI thread. if useCache is true, then the rate will be pulled from cache and the result will be calculated by model instead of API.
      Parameters:
      finalAmount - the amount to be converted
      finalFromCurrency - the start currency code
      finalToCurrency - the end currency code
      mainWindowView - the MainWindowView
      useCache - boolean that determines if the cache should be used
      Returns:
      the task to handle the API request or the cache

    • addCountry

      public void addCountry(String countryName, String currencyCode)
      Add country to model and rebuild the main window to show all the currency code information.
      Parameters:
      countryName - the country name
      currencyCode - the currency code

    • clearCache

      public void clearCache()
      Clear cache.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clear all the selected currency codes and refresh the main window.

    • remove

      public void remove(String currencyCode)
      Remove a selected currency code and refresh the main window.
      Parameters:
      currencyCode - the currency code

    • controlBGM

      public void controlBGM(MediaPlayer.Status status)
      Control theme song. If the theme song is playing, pause it. Otherwise, play it.
      Parameters:
      status - the status

    • controlMode

      public void controlMode(boolean isLight)
      Control mode. If the mode is dark, change to light mode. Otherwise, change to dark mode.
      Parameters:
      isLight - the is light
